name: Sweet & Sour Chicken
description: Crispy chicken tossed in a sweet and tangy sauce, served with steamed rice.

name: Beef Noodles
description: Tender beef strips with stir-fried noodles and vegetables in a savory soy-based sauce.

name: Steamed Dumplings
description: Soft dumplings filled with pork and veggies, delicately steamed and served with dipping sauce.

name: Fried Rice
description: Classic fried rice with mixed vegetables, eggs, and soy sauce. Optionally includes chicken or shrimp.

name: Spring Rolls
description: Golden crispy rolls stuffed with shredded veggies and vermicelli noodles.

name: Shrimp Stir-Fry
description: Juicy shrimp saut√©ed with bell peppers, carrots, and broccoli in garlic sauce.

name: Mapo Tofu
description: Silky tofu and minced meat in a spicy Szechuan sauce. A flavorful Chinese classic.

name: Hot & Sour Soup
description: A spicy, tangy soup with tofu, mushrooms, and bamboo shoots. Perfect for chilly days.

name: Teriyaki Chicken
description: Grilled chicken glazed in a sweet teriyaki sauce, served with rice and vegetables.

name: Sesame Chicken
description: Crispy chicken bites tossed in a sticky sesame sauce and sprinkled with sesame seeds.

name: Moroccan Coscoss
description: Traditional Moroccan couscous with seasonal vegetables, chickpeas, and tender meat.

name: Moroccan Chicken
description: Spiced Moroccan chicken slow-cooked with olives, lemon, and preserved herbs.
